meanings.definition: Acquirers: Those who acquire or obtain something.
meanings.sent1: The acquirers of knowledge were eager students in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The company's acquirers were interested in purchasing new technology.
meanings.sent3: The acquirers of the treasure map were surprised to find it led to a hidden cave.
meanings.sent4: She was like an acquirer of secrets, always finding out things before anyone else.
meanings.sent5: The acquirers of rare stamps traveled the world to add to their collection.

meanings.definition: Acquirers: The act of acquiring or gaining possession of something.
meanings.sent1: The quick acquirers of land were able to expand their farms.
meanings.sent2: Online shopping has made the acquirers of goods more convenient.
meanings.sent3: The acquirers of the last piece of cake were met with jealous glares.
meanings.sent4: His skill in negotiation made him an expert acquirer of valuable items.
meanings.sent5: The acquirers of rare artifacts carefully preserved their findings in a museum.
